actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to designate the week beginning September 11, 1988, as "Let's Face It Week".

summary.text: Designates the week beginning September 11, 1988, as Let's Face It Week. (Let's Face It is a mutual support organization for individuals who have facial disfigurements, their families, and professionals who work with them.)

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the week beginning September 11, 1988, as "Let's Face It Week".
